entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:30 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
